isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000i and 9000i - SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - OPTIONAL SLEEPER MOUNTED RADIO CONTROLS (08REK)

svcproc.title: OPTIONAL SLEEPER MOUNTED RADIO CONTROLS (08REK)
svcproc.para: The sleeper mounted radio controls provides the radio AM/FM band select, station seek (up & down), volume, power and alarm through seven circuits from the sleeper mounted control panel connector (1323), at "B" pillar, and connector (1322), at the radio. The circuit for ILL (8V) is provided through connector (1322) contact A to connector (1323) contact A and sleeper panel connector contact A. The circuit for LCD D1 is provided through connector (1322) contact C to connector (1323) contact C and sleeper panel connector contact C. The circuit for LCD D0 is provided through connector (1322) contact D to connector (1323) contact D and sleeper panel connector contact D. The circuit for V D0 is provided through connector (1322) contact E to connector (1323) contact E and sleeper panel connector contact E. The circuit for LCD CLK is provided through connector (1322) contact F to connector (1323) contact F and sleeper panel connector contact F. The circuit for LCD DE is provided through connector (1322) contact G to connector (1323) contact G and sleeper panel connector contact G. The circuit for GND is provided through connector (1322) contact H to connector (1323) contact H and sleeper panel connector contact H. The radio control LCD panel with amber (backlight), and VOL button, SEEK/TUNE button, BAND MODE button, SEL button with amber (LED), and PWR button with red (LED).
